colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005B (CES ME MCHOD BYA TSUL MDOR BSDUS BKRA SHIS DPAL 'BAR ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, RANG GI SLOB MA DPYOD LDAN DBU MDZAD DGE SLONG RDO RJE MING CAN PHYOGS 'DIR @006A *, ,ME MCHOD KYI SROL KUN TU DAR YANG, MCHOD THABS YID BRTEN RUNG BA ZHIG MI SNANG BA'I KHUNGS LDAN 'KHYER BDE'I CHO GA ZHIG KYANG DGOS ZHES NAN TAN DU BSKUL BA LTAR TSAD THUB KYI DAM PA GONG MA'I MAN NGAG GI PHYAG SROL DANG SGO BSTUN TE ^DAM TSIG RDO RJES GA-YAR KHRAL TZAD DU BRIS PA 'DIS KYANG SKYE 'GRO MANG PO LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
